action.action-desc: Ms. Pressley (for herself, Ms. Titus, Mr. McKinley, and Mr. Meijer) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

Additional sponsors: Mr. Garbarino, Mr. Moolenaar, Mrs. Axne, Mr. Fitzpatrick, Ms. Salazar, Mr. Katko, Ms. Wild, Mr. Gonzalez of Ohio, Mr. Allred, Mrs. Miller-Meeks, Ms. Williams of Georgia, and Ms. Plaskett
Reported from the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure; committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed

form.official-title: To amend the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to authorize the President to provide professional counseling services to victims of emergencies declared under such Act, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Post-Disaster Mental Health Response Act.
Section 502(a)(6) of the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act (42 U.S.C. 5192(a)(6)) is amended by inserting and section 416 after section 408.

endorsement.action-desc: Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed
